Message:
There’s a remote island
where nothing outta
the ordinary ever happens.
That’s where I grew up.
This island only’s got two things.

A hot spring that does
wonders for the lower back,
and a legend of an ebony sword.

Whoever finds that sword
becomes its “swordbearer,”
and they gotta go search
for its true master.

As the story goes,
if the master isn’t found,
the sword’ll drain the life of
the swordbearer until they die.

The boys in my village tried
their hardest to find the sword...
But me? Zero interest.

I mean, I’d be interested if
I get to become the master,

but looking for the “true master”
or whatever sounds like
such a pain...

And besides,
more than anything,
I just wanna have
a peaceful, relaxing life.
